name: @kristoferbaxter/hn-api
description: Reusable HN-API for Node.js implementations of HNPWA. Background caches each feed, their feeditems, and foreground fetches details from publicly available APIs. Responses are delivered in a flat entity cache model for use with React-HN, Preact-HN, and Glimmer-HN.
author: Kristofer Baxter
